pages.title: About Me
pages.text: My name is Pavel Kondratyev and I am a student at McGill University. I study Statistics and Computer Science. In my free time I try to make music and take pictures. I’ve been trying to perfect my latte art for a while but still can’t get it down.Cheers!

posts.title: First post
posts.text: Hi! My name is Pavel but I also go by Paul and Pasha. I drink a lot of coffee and go to McGill. This is a place for me to share my photography, music, code, or whatever else.Cheers!
